line.comment: * al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 180 s
* al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 60 s
* al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 15 s
* All Plugin Variables are explained in the MAIN routine.
* Figures for ticks are in minutes
* Added by SWLU. Disables the plugin for specific gamestarts
* --Check if all sectors have been Un-Established
* --At the same time, check for removal of home sector

sval.val: al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 180 s
al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 60 s
al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 15 s
All Plugin Variables are explained in the MAIN routine.
Figures for ticks are in minutes
Added by SWLU. Disables the plugin for specific gamestarts
--Check if all sectors have been Un-Established
--At the same time, check for removal of home sector
